They do not. Muhammad was the seal of the prophets (they saw other figures such as Jesus and Noah as being minor-like prophets as well, with Muhammad being the last).

Rules put every player on an even playing field. So a player who doesn't RP as well won't necessarily be outdone by one who RP's very well simply because the more experienced player can describe his kill or his actions better.
A new player may run across the deck of a ship, whereas a more experienced player may say "I quickly climb the nearest rope and swing across to the other side of the ship, plunging my sword into the nearest enemy".
My point is, rules make it so both players meet in the middle. At least that's how I've always felt.
I also think that King doesn't have to be Godzilla's *exact* size. I bet his maneuverability would make him tough to deal with for a creature as large as Kong.
